title: Get Involved with Builder
description: Want to help keep Builder chapters running? We are always looking for extra hands to welcome people, jot down wins, or send a short recap. Each chapter operates independentlyâ€”contact your local chapter organizers or reach out to start a new chapter in your city.
impactStatement: If you can spare an hour, that is enough to keep the next builder night rolling.

contact.label: Reach the organizing team
instructions: Use the subject line "I Want to Help" so we can triage fast.
Note: This contact is for the Vancouver chapter. To reach other chapters or start a new one, check the chapters directory.

meta.title: Get Involved | Builder Network
meta.description: Learn how to help Builder chapters and where to contact organizers. Join the global Builder Network or start a chapter in your city.
